transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: Shri Sant Kripa Gruh Udyog se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir aapka ek complaint aaya tha, Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se. Aapne feedback diya tha WhatsApp pe India IndiaMART ka not satisfied.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Kahi bahar hai kya sir?
Customer: Yes sir. Haan ji bike par hu bol sakta hu boliye sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi ye aapne feedback diya tha uske regarding puch raha tha kya dikkat hui jaan sakta hu please?
Customer: Mere ko business loan chahiye matlab delivery ke liye business dala tha isliye select kiya tha.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART loan nahi deti hai na. IndiaMART kaha se loan degi?
Customer: Aapka bank ke sath tie up hai na?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Bank ke sath aapka matlab tie up hai na bank walo ke sath?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART ka kisi bank ke sath koi tie up nahi hai. IndiaMART ki ek company hai Hello Trade karke us company ka hai hamara nahi hai.
Customer: Okay mere ko account manager ne bola aapke bank ke sath tie up hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo jo Hello Trade dusri company hai na sir.
Customer: Okay Hello Trade se contact karne se loan milega kya?
Executive: Un Hello Trade walo ka mai aapko bhijwa deta hu WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur sir ye not satisfied isliye diya tha aapne?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Sir aap directly puch lete ye aap sidhe not satisfied de diya complain open ho gayi hai bachi ke khilaf.
Customer: Aap aap agar WhatsApp par puchoge to WhatsApp par hi reply karunga na sir. Aap agar mere ko call par puch lete to mai call par satisfied karke bata deta.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Waise CV ka ji ne mere ko bola tha ki baba aisa matlab WhatsApp ke bare me koi baat nahi hui thi mere account manager se ki ye hoga wo hoga karke lekin unka just aayega unka just mere ko conversation hua tha ki aapka bank walo ke sath tie up rehta hai aapka Hello Trade ke bare me kuch kuch nahi bataya tha.
Executive: Haan haan nahi nahi wo alag company hi hai Hello Trade karke agar hamari kuch hoti to mai to aapko bata diya rehta. Unka contact number mere ko WhatsApp karke rakhiyega.
Customer: Unka details jo hai sir unka number nahi hai exact unka wo website aur mail ID hai sir.
Customer: Okay customer care number hoga unka?
Executive: Haan wo mai aapko WhatsApp karwa de raha hu uski dikkat nahi hai wo mai aapko WhatsApp pe bhijwa de raha hu. Aur abhi ek help kar dijiyega please abhi jo ye ticket open hua tha na ye mai band kar raha hu. To fir se aapke mail pe jayega feedback ka usse satisfied de dijiyega sir.
Customer: Thik hai sir okay not satisfied mat dijiyega ye account manager ka jata hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai sir no problem aap mere ko ye kar dijiye mai karwa deta hu satisfied karke karoge to koi parwah nahi.
Executive: Haan ji ji mai kar deta hu abhi.
Customer: Okay thik hai aur mere ko uska details WhatsApp karke rakhiyega.
Executive: Nahi Hello walo ka mai bhijwa de raha hu aapko jo Hello Trade hai unka bhej de raha hu abhi.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs a business loan.

- Believes IndiaMART has tie-up with banks.

- Account manager did not mention Hello Trade.



Resolution:

- Clarified IndiaMART doesn't provide loans.

- Informed about Hello Trade for loan assistance.

- Promised to share Hello Trade details on WhatsApp.

- Requested customer to provide 'satisfied' feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share Hello Trade details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- loan, hello trade, feedback, tie-up
